/************************************************************************************************************************************************************
 * @file Ex_16_32.cpp
 * @brief Exercise 16.32: What happens during template argument deduction?
 * @date 2024-02-13
 * 
 * @copyright Copyright (c) 2024
 * 
 *************************************************************************************************************************************************************/

/************************************************************************************************************************************************************
 * During template argument deduction, the compiler uses the arguments of the call to find the template arguments that
 * generate a version of the function that best matches the given call.
 * 
 *************************************************************************************************************************************************************/
